oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Guide for on-farm experiments by organic farmers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bachinger, J.
Stein-Bachinger, K.
Vögel, R.
Werner, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Systems research and participatory research
Research communication and quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Guide will be overworked based on observations and experiences of chosen users to ensure a broad as possible practical relevance. Experiments which have already been implemented to address various questions cover the diversity of possibilities which result through that kind of approach for practice and advising.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: FOOD AND AGRICULTURE ORGANIZATION OF THE UNITED NATIONS
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bachinger, J.; Stein-Bachinger, K.; Vögel, R. and Werner, A. (2000) Guide for on-farm experiments by organic farmers. In: Krell, R. and Zanoli, R. (Eds.) Research Methodologies in Organic farming: On-Farm Participatory Research: Proceedings, FOOD AND AGRICULTURE ORGANIZATION OF THE UNITED NATIONS, REU Technical Series, no. 63, pp. 47-48.
